checks.label: Audit Logs Enabled
checks.description: Non-zero values indicate audit logs may be active

checks.label: ASLR Enabled
checks.description: ASLR must be enabled (value 2) to randomize memory layout and protect against memory-based attacks.

checks.label: KASLR Enabled
checks.description: Kernel Address Space Layout Randomization (KASLR) should be enabled to randomize kernel memory layout.

checks.label: NX (No eXecute) Bit Enabled
checks.description: NX bit must be enabled to prevent execution of code in data memory regions.

checks.label: Core Dumps Disabled
checks.description: Core dumps should be disabled to prevent sensitive data leakage.

checks.label: SECCOMP Enabled
checks.description: SECCOMP must be enabled to restrict system calls.

checks.label: Kernel Modules Loading Restricted
checks.description: Kernel module loading should be disabled after boot to prevent unauthorized module insertion.

checks.label: Protected Symlinks Enabled
checks.description: Symlink protection should be enabled to prevent symlink-based privilege escalation.

checks.label: Protected Hardlinks Enabled
checks.description: Hardlink protection should be enabled to prevent unauthorized file access.

checks.label: dmesg Restriction Enabled
checks.description: Restricting dmesg access prevents unprivileged users from reading kernel logs.
